data.title: Canada has officially banned testing cosmetics on animals
data.description: Canada has moved to ban the testing of cosmetics on animals, joining a number of other countries and American states to outlaw the practice.

data.title: Worried about Lyme disease? CDC warns that 450,000 people may have been infected by a tick-related meat allergy.
data.description: Alpha-gal, which can cause the allergic reaction, is a sugar found in pork, beef, rabbit, lamb and venison, among other meats.
